# vImage.MultidimensionalLookupTable.InterpolationMethod.half

**Case**

Partial linear interpolation between vertices on gray axis and `N-1` nearest vertices.

## Declaration

```swift
case half
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **vImage.MultidimensionalLookupTable.InterpolationMethod.full**: Full linear interpolation.
- **vImage.MultidimensionalLookupTable.InterpolationMethod.none**: Nearest neighbor.
title: vImage.MultidimensionalLookupTable.InterpolationMethod.half
